A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Gaping plot holes\, tonal differences and sharp contradictions in moral message and theme. Cheesy character motivations and humour that is completely out of place and come at the expense of characterisation (Rey is an all powerful rube\, Hux is moron villain without malice and Luke has spent the last 20 yrs sucking the nipples of a pace moose). The Film is a visual spectacle but otherwise falls short of  The Force Awakens.
